mapper.update: update org_grid_rel set ORG_ID = #{orgId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, MKT_ID = #{mktId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, X_ATTRIB = #{xAttrib,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, X_ATTRIB_NAME = #{xAttribName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_DATE = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CREATE_STAFF = #{createStaff,jdbcType=BIGINT}, STATUS_CD = #{statusCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STATUS_DATE = #{statusDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATE_DATE = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATE_STAFF = #{updateStaff,jdbcType=BIGINT}, REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ORG_GRID_REL_ID = #{orgGridRelId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select ORG_GRID_REL_ID, ORG_ID, MKT_ID, X_ATTRIB, X_ATTRIB_NAME, CREATE_DATE, CREATE_STAFF, STATUS_CD, STATUS_DATE, UPDATE_DATE, UPDATE_STAFF, REMARK from org_grid_rel where ORG_GRID_REL_ID = #{orgGridRelId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
select ORG_GRID_REL_ID, ORG_ID, MKT_ID, X_ATTRIB, X_ATTRIB_NAME, CREATE_DATE, CREATE_STAFF, STATUS_CD, STATUS_DATE, UPDATE_DATE, UPDATE_STAFF, REMARK from org_grid_rel
select X_ATTRIB, X_ATTRIB_NAME from org_grid_rel where X_ATTRIB_NAME like CONCAT('%', #{gridName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%')

select X_ATTRIB, X_ATTRIB_NAME from org_grid_rel where X_ATTRIB in
#{item}
